00022 class Tuplet : public Element {
00023       ChordRestList elements;
00024       bool _hasNumber;
00025       bool _hasLine;
00026 
00027    public:
00028       Tuplet(Score*);
00029       ~Tuplet();

00031       virtual Tuplet* clone() const { return new Tuplet(*this); }
00032 
00033       bool hasNumber() const      { return _hasNumber; }
00034       bool hasLine() const        { return _hasLine;   }
00035       void setHasNumber(bool val) { _hasNumber = val;  }
00036       void setHasLine(bool val)   { _hasLine = val;    }
00037 
00038       void layout();
00039       void add(ChordRest* a)      { elements.add(a);   }
00040       void remove(ChordRest* a);
